metadata.description: His vices are legendary. His women are unbelievable. His sanity? Constantly in doubt. And so, it comes as no surprise that Charlie Sheen is currently the most fascinating person on the planet. Sheen's rise from actor of some note to Tiger's Blood advocate will be examined in excruciating detail in Bluewater Comics' Infamous: Charlie Sheen. TMZ, eat your heart out.
metadata.name: Infamous
